cartocss: #layer{ marker-file: url(https://half-earth-staging.vizzuality.com/img/stories-icon.png); marker-width: 30; } #laye[zoom>3]{ marker-width: 21; } #laye[zoom>4]{ marker-width: 22; } #laye[zoom>5]{ marker-width: 24; } #layer[zoom>6]{ marker-width: 26; } #layer[zoom>7]{ marker-width: 28; } #layer[zoom>8]{ marker-width: 30; } #layer{ polygon-opacity: 0; polygon-fill: #D53369; line-width: 0; line-opacity: 0; }
